abstract: From Jay Goltz’s suggestions on how to diagnose business problems to Paul Downs’s attempts to master Google AdWords, here are the best insights from another year in the small-business trenches.
snippet: From Jay Goltz’s suggestions on how to diagnose business problems to Paul Downs’s attempts to master Google AdWords, here are the best insights from another year in the small-business trenches.
lead_paragraph: Once again, here at You’re the Boss, we spent the year in the small-business trenches. Unlike some publications, we don’t emphasize the stories of rock star entrepreneurs who never seem to struggle; instead, we emphasize the struggle.

headline.main: How to Run a Small Business
